snippet: "The Iron Lady" does not sidestep Margaret Thatcher's dementia.
abstract: "The Iron Lady" does not sidestep Margaret Thatcher's dementia.
lead_paragraph: Even if I hadn't been a worshipful fan of Meryl Streep since 1978, even if she hadn't won yet another Oscar nomination for playing Margaret Thatcher, I would've gone to see "The Iron Lady." The ways in which popular culture portrays aging these days seem worth paying attention to.
